meanings.sent1: The room was filled with a moschate scent from the incense.
meanings.sent2: The moschate aroma of the perfume lingered in the air.
meanings.sent3: The moschate smell of the old books made the librarian sneeze.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the forest released a moschate fragrance into the evening air.
meanings.sent5: The moschate odor of the flowers attracted bees from afar.

meanings.sent1: The soap had a moschate fragrance that reminded her of the woods.
meanings.sent2: The moschate cologne he wore made him feel confident.
meanings.sent3: The moschate aroma of the cake baking in the oven filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The moschate scent of the candle brought back memories of her childhood home.
meanings.sent5: The moschate perfume of the flowers wafted through the garden.

meanings.sent1: The moschate oil was used in traditional medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: The moschate flavor of the dish was unique and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The moschate essence in the air hinted at the presence of a wild animal.
meanings.sent4: The moschate undertones in the wine added depth to its taste.
meanings.sent5: The moschate ingredient in the perfume gave it a rich and exotic scent.
